title: Propose Solar Plus Storage Solution
description: A sales agent is creating a proposal for a commercial customer for a rooftop solar and battery storage system.

tasks.description: Analyze the customer's interval meter data to understand their load profile and identify peak demand charges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the customer has high demand charges in the afternoon.

tasks.description: Size an optimal solar and storage system to maximize self-consumption and perform peak shaving.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends a 250 kW solar array and a 100 kW/200 kWh battery system.

tasks.description: Calculate the estimated annual bill savings, project IRR, and payback period for the proposed system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear financial summary for the customer.

tasks.description: Generate a formal proposal document including the technical and financial details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a professional, customer-facing proposal.
